item.title: 2023-03-07(화) 코리아헤럴드 신문기사 요약
item.description: 1면 S. Korean foundation to compensate victims of Japan’s forced labor Work longer, rest longer: Korea to add flexibility to 52-hour workweek Seoul-Tokyo trade talks to resume after 3 years 2면 Finance Minister confident inflation will soon cool off Jeju 2nd airport plan back on track 3면 [New Neighbors] Going for broker: Farms struggle to keep seasonal foreign workers Yoon may visit Japan this month to mark landmark deal: sources
